sdata.e: And even outside these nations, English is perhaps more widely used as a medium of international communication than any other language.

sdata.e: For world peace, therefore, we must develop the consciousness that we are all one people of planet Earth through continual international cultural and economic exchange.

sdata.j: バラック・オバマは、|↑国際↑↓こくさい↓↑的|↑↓てき↓な↑核兵器↑↓かくへいき↓↑禁止↑↓きんし↓を↑目指↑↓めざ↓しているが、すべての↑戦争↑↓せんそう↓に↑対↑↓たい↓して↑否定↑↓ひてい↓↑的↑↓てき↓なのではない。
sdata.e: Barack Obama is aiming for an international ban on nuclear weapons, but is not against them in all wars.
